media.headline: Low Carb Caesar Salad with Chicken
media.title: Ingredients
media.text:
• Meat
  • 1 lb Chicken breasts
  • 1 oz Anchovies in olive oil
  • Produce
  • 4 cloves Garlic, fresh
  • 6 cups Romaine lettuce
  • Condiments
  • 1 Caesar salad dressing, Low Carb Homemade
  • 1 tsp Dijon mustard
  • 2 tbsp Lemon juice
  • 3/4 cup Mayonnaise
  • Baking & Spices
  • 1/4 tsp Black pepper
  • 1 Pepper
  • 1 Salt
  • 1 pinch Salt
  • Dairy
  • 1/2 cup Parmesan crisps
  • 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese
  • 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, grated

Warm Lentlis with Wilted Chard, Roasted Beefs and Goat Cheese

carousels.headline: Lentil Frittata
carousels.text: Perfect for a hearty breakfast, lunch or dinner, this lentil frittata is an absolute favorite. The lentils add a nice nuttiness balanced by the potatoes and feta.To bring it all together, we top the frittata with chopped kalamata and green olives plus a good drizzle of olive oil. You can make this dish ahead of time and enjoy it for a few days since it keeps well in the fridge and reheats nicely, too.
